### 10.1 Tidying data

Often observations are spread across multiple data sets, and you will have to join data sets into one single table. 

**Go through the RStudio Primer 4.3 [Separate and Unite Columns](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/4.3)** and learn about the different functions to join data sets.
